meanings.definition: To impose an additional tax on something.
meanings.sent1: The government is surtaxing imported goods to raise more money.
meanings.sent2: The city council decided to start surtaxing luxury items.
meanings.sent3: The idea of surtaxing candy to promote healthier eating habits seems funny.
meanings.sent4: Surtaxing the rich is like squeezing water from a stone.
meanings.sent5: The image of surtaxing each piece of candy at the store is hard to forget.

meanings.definition: The act of levying an extra tax on something.
meanings.sent1: The surtaxing of cigarettes has led to a decrease in smoking.
meanings.sent2: The surtaxing on gasoline has caused prices to rise at the pump.
meanings.sent3: The surtaxing of ice cream in winter seems a bit silly.
meanings.sent4: The surtaxing on happiness is like trying to tax the air we breathe.
meanings.sent5: The concept of surtaxing on top of regular taxes is quite burdensome.
